name: Dungeons & Dragons
description: Dungeons & Dragons 5th Edition (2014) offers a high-fantasy role-playing system known for its flexibility, immersive storytelling, and simplified rules that allow players to create unique characters across diverse classes and races.

name: Dungeons & Dragons
description: Dungeons & Dragons 5th Edition (2024) continues the iconic fantasy system, refining mechanics to suit evolving player preferences, while staying true to the classic elements of exploration, role-playing, and combat.

name: Pathfinder
description: Pathfinder 2nd Edition (2019) is a fantasy role-playing system built on deep character customization and complex tactical combat, ideal for players who enjoy intricate rules and a high degree of control over character abilities.

name: Call of Cthulhu
description: Call of Cthulhu 7th Edition (2014) is a horror role-playing system that emphasizes investigation, psychological horror, and survival, set in a world inspired by H.P. Lovecraft’s mythos, where players often face otherworldly threats beyond their control.
